intro: Delissea angusta, commonly known as the narrow-leaved delissea, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features slender, upright stems with narrow, lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its small, yellowish flowers appear in clusters and bloom during the warmer months. Delissea angusta is typically found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
